channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #200, including every tabletop rpg project started between 07/31 and 08/15
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #200, including every tabletop rpg project started between 07/31 and 08/15. The 200. edition of the collection covers two week and happens to feature exactly 200 active projects; even a Japanese ttrpg – the last one was in 2020. With the Zine Quest being a big reason why so many projects got launched. Of the projects I like to highlight Mail Order Apokalypse. It’s a zine-sized ttrpg about mail being delivered in a post apocalypse using Into the Odd inspired rules. I did consider doing a brief introduction of all the games to honor the 200. edition, yet, well,…. 73 games are a few to many,… thus, take a look for yourself: English Crowdfundings 5 Roleplaying Games 4 Fantasy Roleplaying Games 2 Solo Roleplaying Games 2 Settings 3 D&D 5E Settings 12 Sourcebooks 2 Adventures 6 D&D 5E Adventures 6 Dice Projects 2 Coin Projects 2 Accessoires 3 Boxes 1 Tracker 3 Map Projects 1 Notebook 1 Documentation 2 Enamel Pins 1 Comic 3 Various RPG Projects 6 Zine Roleplaying Games 2 Zine Roleplaying Games (Anime) 3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Drama) 6 Zine Roleplaying Games (Fantasy) 3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Horror) 4 Zine Roleplaying Games (Fairytale-like) 3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Multiple Games) 4 Zine Roleplaying Games (Pre-, Current-, Post-Apocalypse) 4 Zine Roleplaying Games (Be An Animal) 3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Be A Monster) 2 Zine Roleplaying Games (Be A Skeleton) 2 Zine Roleplaying Games (Be A Zombie) 4 Zine Roleplaying Games (Universal) 3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Urban Fantasy) 6 Zine Solo Roleplaying Games 2 Zine Solo Roleplaying Games (Anti-Capitalist) 2 Zine Solo Roleplaying Games (Classic Fantasy) 3 Zine Solo Roleplaying Games (Science Fiction) 4 Zine Settings 4 Zine Sourcebooks (System-Neutral) 4 Zine Sourcebooks (System-Specific) 4 Zine Sourcebooks (Illustrations & NSCs) 5 Zine Sourcebooks (Micro Games/Systems) 7 Zine Sourcebooks (D&D 5E) 4 Zine Sourcebooks (DCC) 7 Zine Sourcebooks (OSR/OSE) 5 Zine Adventures 12 Zine D&D 5E Adventures 2 Zine Mothership Adventures 5 Zine MÖRK Borg Adventures 8 Zine OSR/OSE Adventures German Crowdfundings 1 Setting 1 Larp Book Spanish Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Italian Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying 1 Gamebook Japanese Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/08/15/crowdfunding-collection-200/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #200, including every tabletop rpg project started between 07/31 and 08/15
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #200, including every tabletop rpg project started between 07/31 and 08/15.

The 200. edition of the collection covers two week and happens to feature exactly 200 active projects; even a Japanese ttrpg – the last one was in 2020. With the Zine Quest being a big reason why so many projects got launched.

Of the projects I like to highlight Mail Order Apokalypse. It’s a zine-sized ttrpg about mail being delivered in a post apocalypse using Into the Odd inspired rules.
I did consider doing a brief introduction of all the games to honor the 200. edition, yet, well,…. 73 games are a few to many,… thus, take a look for yourself:

English Crowdfundings

5 Roleplaying Games
4 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Solo Roleplaying Games
2 Settings
3 D&D 5E Settings
12 Sourcebooks
2 Adventures
6 D&D 5E Adventures
6 Dice Projects
2 Coin Projects
2 Accessoires
3 Boxes
1 Tracker
3 Map Projects
1 Notebook
1 Documentation
2 Enamel Pins
1 Comic
3 Various RPG Projects

6 Zine Roleplaying Games
2 Zine Roleplaying Games (Anime)
3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Drama)
6 Zine Roleplaying Games (Fantasy)
3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Horror)
4 Zine Roleplaying Games (Fairytale-like)
3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Multiple Games)
4 Zine Roleplaying Games (Pre-, Current-, Post-Apocalypse)
4 Zine Roleplaying Games (Be An Animal)
3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Be A Monster)
2 Zine Roleplaying Games (Be A Skeleton)
2 Zine Roleplaying Games (Be A Zombie)
4 Zine Roleplaying Games (Universal)
3 Zine Roleplaying Games (Urban Fantasy)
6 Zine Solo Roleplaying Games
2 Zine Solo Roleplaying Games (Anti-Capitalist)
2 Zine Solo Roleplaying Games (Classic Fantasy)
3 Zine Solo Roleplaying Games (Science Fiction)
4 Zine Settings
4 Zine Sourcebooks (System-Neutral)
4 Zine Sourcebooks (System-Specific)
4 Zine Sourcebooks (Illustrations & NSCs)
5 Zine Sourcebooks (Micro Games/Systems)
7 Zine Sourcebooks (D&D 5E)
4 Zine Sourcebooks (DCC)
7 Zine Sourcebooks (OSR/OSE)
5 Zine Adventures
12 Zine D&D 5E Adventures
2 Zine Mothership Adventures
5 Zine MÖRK Borg Adventures
8 Zine OSR/OSE Adventures

German Crowdfundings

1 Setting
1 Larp Book

Spanish Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying

Italian Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying
1 Gamebook

Japanese Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/08/15/crowdfunding-collection-200/
